title: MBTI by Your Face
subtitle: Choose your gender and try one of the analysis methods below.
webcamDoneMessage: Analysis completed. Press the button to try again.
share.title: My MBTI by face is {{mbti}}!

desc.INFP: Idealistic and empathetic with a rich inner world.
desc.ENFP: Energetic, creative, and full of innovative ideas.
desc.INTP: Logical and independent with a thirst for knowledge.
desc.ESFJ: Kind and sociable, valuing harmony with others.
desc.ENTJ: Decisive, strategic, and a natural leader.
desc.ISFJ: Loyal and quiet with a strong sense of duty.
desc.INFJ: Insightful and warm, often offering deep guidance.
desc.ISTJ: Responsible and dependable with strong principles.
desc.ESFP: Sociable and positive, lighting up every room.
desc.ENFJ: Inspiring and empathetic leaders with strong values.
desc.INTJ: Strategic and goal-oriented with big visions.
desc.ENTP: Quick learners who thrive on innovation and debate.
